track.name: Django
comments: I like the change up on the tempos. Cool gem.
Superlative rhythm!
love this modern jaz
This is classic Modern Jazz Quartet. Just great !!!!!
This is one of the giant groups of my dad's collection... this is a shimmering tune.
traumhaft
definitely one of the original "Cool Jazz" groups.  Makes one feel stirred, not shaken......
Una joya.
excellent

MJQ were great. So was Django. Nothing like it now, is there? So nostalgic looking back. I am still in this groove. No wonder it is difficult to relate to what is going on now. Bring back simple, eloquent, harmonious, melodic and swinging jazz played by the gentlemen in suits as smart was the rule.
Loved them in my teens, still love them at nearly 70 !
Il en est ainsi nostalgiques d'une manière très positive.
my fav since the fifties mellow
Delicious! A classic in just beautiful music! Could listen to these fellows for hours on end...
Gentle and delicate. A real classic.
Django et Lonely Woman joués par le MJQ......AAAAAAAAAAAAhhhhhhh C'est plus que superbe!
MJQ...still sounds fabulous!
With Great Feeling
if not the coolest , one of the coolest jazz groups ever!!
Beautiful.  Sounds a little like something out of 'Sideways'.
